snippet: A copy of the Mona Lisa thought to have been made much later than the original seems to have been made at the same time.
abstract: A copy of the Mona Lisa thought to have been made much later than the original seems to have been made at the same time.

headline.main: Prado's Mona Lisa Copy May Have Been Made in Tandem With Original
headline.print_headline: Mona Lisa Copy in Spain May Be Her ‘Sister’
